description: Examples of games that store game data in VBF files include the following: Art of Murder: Cards of Destiny Art of Murder: Hunt for the Puppeteer Chronicles of Mystery: The Scorpio Ritual Chronicles of Mystery: The Tree of Life While VBF files are referenced by the games above, they are not meant to be opened manually. However, the contents of VBF files can be extracted using a file unpacking utility like Unpakke.
